snippet.title: Doki Doki Dollmaker | BL Visual Novel Promo
snippet.description:
An indie boys love (BL or BxB) visual novel. Releases April 14th, 2023 - exclusively on Itch.io! ♥

Download here: https://karitsa.itch.io/dokidokidollmaker

Twitter: https://twitter.com/DokiDollmaker (@DokiDollmaker)
Development Blog: https://dokidokidollmaker.tumblr.com
Kickstarter: https://kickstarter.com/projects/karitsa/doki-doki-dollmaker-a-heartfelt-bl-visual-novel

SPECIFICS:
-  Genre: BL, Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life, Magic
-  Rating: T (13+) for suggestive themes and tobacco reference/use
-  Optional epilogues rated M (18+) for consensual sexual scenes and nudity
-  Content Warnings: https://dokidokidollmaker.tumblr.com/contentwarnings
-  Engine: Ren'Py
-  Platform: PC (Windows, Mac, and Linux)
-  Resolution: 1268 x 952 (4:3 Aspect Ratio)
-  Language: English
-  Word Count: 120,000+ words (excludes scripting/programming language)
-  Blind/Visually-Impaired Accessibility: Yes

FEATURES:
-  5 Character Romance Options
-  50+ CG Images
-  10+ Hours of Gameplay
-  8 Different Endings
-  Optional 18+ Epilogues

GAME CREDITS: https://dokidokidollmaker.tumblr.com/credits

Video Editing: KotoriMWorks
Music: https://www.purple-planet.com
